sense.def:
To have doubts about something
pomeni o nečem biti negotov.

seg.quote: Frank had no doubts about the outcome of the trial.

sense.def:
To doubt whether something is true or possible
pomeni misliti, da nekaj najbrž ni resnično ali mogoče.

seg.quote: I doubt if they will ever want vanilla pudding again.
Maybe he changed his mind, but I doubt it.

sense.def:
To doubt something
pomeni misliti, da morda nekaj ni res ali morda ne obstaja.

seg.quote: ...men who never doubt their own superiority.

sense.def:
To doubt someone
ali
to doubt someone's word
pomeni misliti, da morda nekdo ne govori po pravici.

Če rečemo, da
there is no doubt about something
, želimo poudariti, da je nekaj res.

seg.quote: Rose was mad, there was no doubt about it.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
no doubt
lahko tudi povemo, da sklepamo, da je nekaj res.

seg.quote: As Jennifer has no doubt told you, we are leaving tomorrow.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
without doubt
ali
without a doubt
poudarimo, da je nekaj res.

seg.quote: Hugh Scanlon became without doubt one of the most powerful men in Britain.

sense.def:
Če je dokazano, da je nekaj resnično
beyond a doubt
, je vsekakor resnično.

seg.quote: We have established the ownership beyond all doubt.

sense.def:
Če je nekaj
in doubt
ali
open to doubt
, je negotovo.

seg.quote: Devaluation had put Concorde's future in doubt.

sense.def:
To be in doubt about something
pomeni imeti pomisleke o nečem.

seg.quote: If in doubt, call the doctor.
